author: Football Italia staff
title: Lippi: 'Resume the season!'
description: Marcello Lippi has joined the calls for the Serie A season to be completed and is still open to managing a national team ânot too far awayâ.
content:
Marcello Lippi has joined the calls for the Serie A season to be completed and is still open to managing a national team “not too far away”.
Lippi made it clear he was in favour of resuming the campaign during an interview with Sky Sport Italia from his home… [+1427 chars]
